DataElement.preferredName: Biological Therapy Last Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to the last administration of biological therapy as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biological Therapy Last Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A form of treatment that implies the administration of substances which produce a biological reaction in the organism thus enhancing or restoring the host immune response, modifying the behavior of cancer cells, blocking the pathways of cell neoplastic transformation and tumor ability to metastasize, or facilitating the repair of cells damaged by aggressive forms of cancer treatment.  It includes the use of sera, antitoxins, vaccines, genes, cells, tissues, and organs._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Biological therapy is a form of treatment that implies the administration of substances which produce a biological reaction in the organism enhancing or restoring the host immune response, modifying the behavior of cancer cells, blocking the pathways of cell neoplastic transformation and tumor ability to metastasize, or facilitating the repairment of cells damaged by aggressive forms of cancer treatment.  It includes the use of sera, antitoxins, vaccines, genes, cells, tissues, and organs

Concepts.definition: A type of treatment that uses substances derived from or made by living organisms to treat disease; this includes both naturally occurring and synthetic products.

Property.preferredName: Last Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was last dose of biological t
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was last dose of biological therapy, immunomodulatory agents, vaccines, differentiating agents, used to treat cancer at least 7 days prior to enrollment?
